Key.English: ALiVE is an Arma 3 Mod that enhances MP play with a more strategic enemy, enhanced combat ambience, combat support, logistics and revolutionary mission persistence and online statistics

A massive thank you to Johari, the band that created the incredible Metal cover of the Arma 3 This Is War theme tune, in allowing us to include their track as part of ALiVE. Click on the logo to learn more!
